title: How to Draw a Snowman

steps.headline: Start with the guidelines by drawing a big ball near the bottom of the paper
Draw a medium sized ball overlapping the top of the big ball
Draw another ball on top of those that is slightly smaller than the rest.
steps.description: You can use more than three balls, just make sure the one you put on top of the others needs to be slightly smaller than the one before.

steps.headline: Sketch in the carrot nose and circles for the face and buttons.
Sketch a scarf below the smallest ball.
steps.description: Draw a hat that looks like a top hat for your snowman’s head.

steps.headline: Sketch 2 branches for his arms.
steps.description: Finally, sketch extra snow under the biggest ball and add a snow floor.

steps.headline: Finalize the outlines and erase the guidelines.
Color your drawing to add life to the snowman.
